definition: there's still time/able to do sth in time
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
and/to reach/up to/in time for

sentences.english: Before I could answer, she had turned around and started back out onto the field.
sentences.chinese: 我还未来得及回话，她已经转身向足球场上走去了。

sentences.english: Hardly had I had time to say 'Goodbye' to the last year when the new year came here.
sentences.chinese: 还没有来得及辞旧岁，新年就已经来到了。

sentences.english: He had pressed the button before we could stop him.
sentences.chinese: 我们还没来得及阻止他，他已经按了电钮。

sentences.english: I got up late this morning and went to school without feeding my cats.
sentences.chinese: 我早上起床晚了，所以没来得及喂猫就上学去了。

sentences.english: Anyway, if he leaves before I see him, then tell him I said hello.
sentences.chinese: 要是我没来得及见他，他就走了，帮我问候他。

sentences.english: The old fellow croaked before he could tell us who shot him.
sentences.chinese: 那老人没来得及告诉我们是谁向他开的枪就断气了。

sentences.english: Hehad run out of the room before I could stop him.
sentences.chinese: 我还没来得及拦住他，他就跑出了屋子。

sentences.english: And before I could even smile, I suddenly sneezed.
sentences.chinese: 还没来得及笑出来，我突然打了个喷嚏。

sentences.english: The enemy aircraft plunged down in flames before the pilot had time to bail out.
sentences.chinese: 敌飞行员还没来得及跳伞，飞机就冒着火栽下来了。

sentences.english: Decorations. If you have yet to decorate there is still time for that as well.
sentences.chinese: 如果你还在进行装饰，那么也是来得及的。

sentences.english: He had rushed out before I could stop him.
sentences.chinese: 我还没来得及拦住他他就冲出去了。

sentences.english: They were whirled away before they could say anything.
sentences.chinese: 他们还没来得及说什么，就被带走了。

sentences.english: He tore off before we said goodbye to him.
sentences.chinese: 我们还没来得及向他道别他就匆匆走了。

sentences.english: Perhaps there was still time to intervene in behalf of that man.
sentences.chinese: 可能还来得及由他出面说一下情？

sentences.english: The thief had jumped out of the window before the police broke in.
sentences.chinese: 警察还没来得及破门进入，小偷就已跳窗逃窜了。

sentences.english: The last post is at 7 p.m. You can still make it if you go by bike.
sentences.chinese: 最后的邮递时间是晚上七点，你现在骑车去还来得及。

definition: there's not enough time (to do sth)/it's too late (to do sth)
hasty/hurried
late
all of a sudden/hurriedly
to be just about to/to be on the point of
urgently
to be just about to/to have just started to
hurriedly
hurriedly
an instant (Sanskrit: ksana)/split second/the twinkling of an eye
unable to change sth/unable to deal with
in a great rush/in a flurry
fortunately
split second
hastily
hurried/hasty
